trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Kirkcaldy
There were no other sightings in Kirkcaldy on or around June 13th 2011
Summary: My friend Emils and i were taking some pics of the burnoff from a local factory
divs: sighting detailswe were taking some pics of the burn-off at the local plastic factory, when i noticed that an object preceded a trail of smoke\vapors. it's trajectory remained the same throughout until it disappeared behind some cloud at the skyline. we took several pictures with a zoom camera, of which are of good quality. we have zoomed closer on our pc package for closer inspection and think that it could be studied in greater depth with better equipment. we have downloaded the pics to a file-share for anyone who wishes to study further. [link moved to additional evidence section\cms\tg]
